info.name: TN5250 REST API
info.description: Complete API collection for TN5250 screen automation with company maintenance test data. Updated for dynamic company_id and operation parameters.

body.raw:
{
  "screen_config": {
    "screen_name": "company_maintenance",
    "description": "Company maintenance screen for adding/editing company information",
    "option": "21"
  },
  "field_configs": [
    {
      "field_name": "COMPANY_NAME",
      "max_length": 28,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 2,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 2,
      "description": "Company name field"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "COMPANY_ADDRESS",
      "max_length": 60,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 2,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 2,
      "description": "Company address field (spans 2 lines)"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "COMPANY_LOCATION",
      "max_length": 20,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 1,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
      "description": "Company location/city field"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "COMPANY_REGION",
      "max_length": 2,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 1,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
      "description": "Company region/state field"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "COMPANY_POSTAL_CODE",
      "max_length": 10,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 1,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
      "description": "Company postal/zip code field"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "COMPANY_COUNTRY",
      "max_length": 2,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 1,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
      "description": "Company country code field"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "COMPANY_PHONE",
      "max_length": 10,
      "required": false,
      "type": "digits",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 1,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 3,
      "description": "Company phone number field"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "COMPANY_FAX",
      "max_length": 10,
      "required": false,
      "type": "digits",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 1,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 3,
      "description": "Company fax number field"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "COMPANY_TYPE",
      "max_length": 1,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": ["F", "S"],
      "tabs_needed": 1,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
      "description": "Company type (F=Full S=Subsidiary)"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "PERIODS_PER_YEAR",
      "max_length": 2,
      "required": true,
      "type": "digits",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 1,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
      "description": "Number of periods per year"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "FISCAL_YEAR_ENDING",
      "max_length": 2,
      "required": true,
      "type": "digits",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 2,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 2,
      "description": "Fiscal year ending month"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "CLOSING_ACCOUNT",
      "max_length": 6,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 1,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
      "description": "Closing account number"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "BASE_CURRENCY",
      "max_length": 3,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 2,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 2,
      "description": "Base currency code"
    },
    {
      "field_name": "EXCHANGE_ACCOUNT",
      "max_length": 6,
      "required": true,
      "type": "text",
      "valid_values": null,
      "tabs_needed": 0,
      "tabs_needed_empty": 0,
      "description": "Exchange account number"
    }
  ],
  "navigation_steps": [
    {
      "step_order": 1,
      "screen_title_contains": "Sign On",
      "action_type": "credentials",
      "action_value": "USERNAME,PASSWORD",
      "wait_time": 3,
      "description": "Enter login credentials"
    },
    {
      "step_order": 2,
      "screen_title_contains": "Press Enter to continue",
      "action_type": "enter",
      "action_value": "",
      "wait_time": 2,
      "description": "Press enter to continue past message screen"
    },
    {
      "step_order": 3,
      "screen_title_contains": "IBM i Main Menu",
      "action_type": "command",
      "action_value": "CALL PGM(LOADERP) PARM(('*ADMIN') ('AdminAaBb'))",
      "wait_time": 3,
      "description": "Execute program call command"
    },
    {
      "step_order": 4,
      "screen_title_contains": "*ADMINISTRATOR",
      "action_type": "option",
      "action_value": "21",
      "wait_time": 3,
      "description": "Select company maintenance option"
    },
    {
      "step_order": 5,
      "screen_title_contains": "Company Maintenance",
      "action_type": "option_with_id",
      "action_value": "{OPERATION},{COMPANY_ID}",
      "wait_time": 3,
      "description": "Select operation and enter company ID (uses dynamic values)"
    },
    {
      "step_order": 6,
      "screen_title_contains": "Name",
      "action_type": "form_fill",
      "action_value": "",
      "wait_time": 1,
      "description": "Fill company details form"
    }
  ]
}

response.name: Get Company Maintenance Screen Config
response.body:
{
    "field_configs": [
        {
            "description": "Company name field",
            "field_name": "COMPANY_NAME",
            "max_length": 28,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 2,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 2,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Company address field (spans 2 lines)",
            "field_name": "COMPANY_ADDRESS",
            "max_length": 60,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 2,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 2,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Company location/city field",
            "field_name": "COMPANY_LOCATION",
            "max_length": 20,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 1,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Company region/state field",
            "field_name": "COMPANY_REGION",
            "max_length": 2,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 1,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Company postal/zip code field",
            "field_name": "COMPANY_POSTAL_CODE",
            "max_length": 10,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 1,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Company country code field",
            "field_name": "COMPANY_COUNTRY",
            "max_length": 2,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 1,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Company phone number field",
            "field_name": "COMPANY_PHONE",
            "max_length": 10,
            "required": false,
            "tabs_needed": 1,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 3,
            "type": "digits",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Company fax number field",
            "field_name": "COMPANY_FAX",
            "max_length": 10,
            "required": false,
            "tabs_needed": 1,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 3,
            "type": "digits",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Company type (F=Full S=Subsidiary)",
            "field_name": "COMPANY_TYPE",
            "max_length": 1,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 1,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": [
                "F",
                "S"
            ]
        },
        {
            "description": "Number of periods per year",
            "field_name": "PERIODS_PER_YEAR",
            "max_length": 2,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 1,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
            "type": "digits",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Fiscal year ending month",
            "field_name": "FISCAL_YEAR_ENDING",
            "max_length": 2,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 2,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 2,
            "type": "digits",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Closing account number",
            "field_name": "CLOSING_ACCOUNT",
            "max_length": 6,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 1,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 1,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Base currency code",
            "field_name": "BASE_CURRENCY",
            "max_length": 3,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 2,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 2,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": null
        },
        {
            "description": "Exchange account number",
            "field_name": "EXCHANGE_ACCOUNT",
            "max_length": 6,
            "required": true,
            "tabs_needed": 0,
            "tabs_needed_empty": 0,
            "type": "text",
            "valid_values": null
        }
    ],
    "navigation_steps": [
        {
            "action_type": "credentials",
            "action_value": "USERNAME,PASSWORD",
            "description": "Enter login credentials",
            "screen_title_contains": "Sign On",
            "step_order": 1,
            "wait_time": 3
        },
        {
            "action_type": "enter",
            "action_value": "",
            "description": "Press enter to continue past message screen",
            "screen_title_contains": "Press Enter to continue",
            "step_order": 2,
            "wait_time": 2
        },
        {
            "action_type": "command",
            "action_value": "CALL PGM(LOADERP) PARM(('*ADMIN') ('AdminAaBb'))",
            "description": "Execute program call command",
            "screen_title_contains": "IBM i Main Menu",
            "step_order": 3,
            "wait_time": 3
        },
        {
            "action_type": "option",
            "action_value": "21",
            "description": "Select company maintenance option",
            "screen_title_contains": "*ADMINISTRATOR",
            "step_order": 4,
            "wait_time": 3
        },
        {
            "action_type": "option_with_id",
            "action_value": "{OPERATION},{COMPANY_ID}",
            "description": "Select operation and enter company ID (uses dynamic values)",
            "screen_title_contains": "Company Maintenance",
            "step_order": 5,
            "wait_time": 3
        },
        {
            "action_type": "form_fill",
            "action_value": "",
            "description": "Fill company details form",
            "screen_title_contains": "Name",
            "step_order": 6,
            "wait_time": 1
        }
    ],
    "screen_config": {
        "description": "Company maintenance screen for adding/editing company information",
        "option": "21",
        "screen_name": "company_maintenance"
    }
}

response.name: Validate Screen Data - Valid
response.body:
{
    "messages": [
        "✓ COMPANY_NAME: 'TEST COMPANY 594' (16/28 chars)",
        "✓ COMPANY_ADDRESS: '123 MAIN STREET' (15/60 chars)",
        "✓ COMPANY_LOCATION: 'ST CLOUD' (8/20 chars)",
        "✓ COMPANY_REGION: 'MN' (2/2 chars)",
        "✓ COMPANY_POSTAL_CODE: '56301' (5/10 chars)",
        "✓ COMPANY_COUNTRY: 'US' (2/2 chars)",
        "✓ COMPANY_PHONE: '' (0/10 chars)",
        "✓ COMPANY_FAX: '' (0/10 chars)",
        "✓ COMPANY_TYPE: 'F' (1/1 chars)",
        "✓ PERIODS_PER_YEAR: '12' (2/2 chars)",
        "✓ FISCAL_YEAR_ENDING: '12' (2/2 chars)",
        "✓ CLOSING_ACCOUNT: '000000' (6/6 chars)",
        "✓ BASE_CURRENCY: 'USD' (3/3 chars)",
        "✓ EXCHANGE_ACCOUNT: '000000' (6/6 chars)"
    ],
    "valid": true
}
